channel.title: Making myself Admin?
channel.description:
Okay, so I saught help outside of this website and now I can compile... But how do I make myself Admin? I have a file called moreinfo and Characters, I am using cheezscape btw. Anyways I try to go into chatracters and edit my character rights and save the file, I exit the server and compile and then run the server, and I talk but I don't see my crown. I think hmm and then I check my file in the Characters folder and it says character rights 0!! How do I fix this?
P.S (Sorry for making 2 threads in a row, if we could delete threads this message would not be here)

item.title: Making myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @Xo_0wner_oX Xo 0wner oX
item.description:
@Xo_0wner_oX wrote:

Go to Characters and click on your name, Go down to playerRights: 0 you can change it.
1:Mod
2:Admin
3:Owner/Co-Owner

Read full topic

Keep fiddling around with the skill ID’s… I forgot what mining was… I just messed around for a while before I found out what mining was

Okay, and umm… I cant seem to get mining or defence to ::setxp : I got all the others to 99 though.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 14, 2006, 09:12:44 PM[/size][hr]Oh nevermind I got it to work

@Sleep wrote:

Welcome, if you are familiar with Rs2cheating I am a mod on there but they don’t have an active section for Rs Private servers so I decided to come here.

item.title: Making myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

I know it does I would love it also, but sadly you can’t for the time being.

As for the stats if you are admin and you are using Cheez in game type ::setxp -SKILL ID- -XP FOR THE SKILL-

if the stat is 1 numeral then you have to put a 0 in front of it. If it is 10 or what have you it is fine.

EG: ::setxp 00 14000000

That is what you would do for 99 attack, the skill ID starts at 00 and goes to 20 just to let you know [br][size=1]Posted at: July 14, 2006, 09:02:56 PM[/size][hr]If that doesn’t work for you try this, copy the .bat file and the other file to where your server files are and click datviewer.bat and you can edit stats like that. I don’t know how to use it correctly so I just use ::setxp for now.

DatViewer

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @Hadoku Hadoku
item.description:
@Hadoku wrote:

Thanks sooo much

How can I make myself have all 99 stats? Or more if it’s possible…?

Also, is there ANY way I can see my crown? It makes me feel more comforting

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself Admin?
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

Go to Client.Java and search for X91 and replace all X91 with the name that you want to use for the admin account. A bit of a draw back you can’t see your own crown though, but you can spawn etc… depends on how your Cheez is set up.

Read full topic
